00024 /* function FormPeriodeMult
00025  * Purpose :
00026  *         Generate the form for the periode
00027  * 
00028  * parm : 
00029  *      - $p_cn connexion
00030  * gen :
00031  *      - none
00032  * return:
00033  *      - string containing html code for the
00034  *        form
00035  *
00036  */ 
00037 function FormPeriodeMult($p_cn)
00038 {
00039   $sql="select p_id,to_char(p_start,'DD.MM.YYYY') as p_start,
00040                     to_char(p_end,'DD.MM.YYYY') as p_end 
00041         from parm_periode  
00042             order by p_exercice,p_start";
00043   $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,$sql);
00044   $Max=pg_NumRows($Res);
00045   $ret='<SELECT NAME="periode[]" SIZE="12" multiple>';
00046   for ( $i = 0; $i < $Max;$i++) {
00047     $l_line=pg_fetch_array($Res,$i);
00048     $ret.=sprintf('<OPTION VALUE="%s">%s - %s',$l_line['p_id']
00049                   ,$l_line['p_start']
00050                   ,$l_line['p_end']);
00051 
00052   }
00053   $ret.="</SELECT>";
00054   return $ret;
00055 }
00056 
00057 /* function FormPeriode
00058  * Purpose :
00059  *         Generate the form for the periode
00060  * 
00061  * parm : 
00062  *      - $p_cn connexion
00063  *      - $p_default default periode
00064  *      - $p_type the type of the periode
00065  *      - $p_suff the suffix of the name 
00066  * gen :
00067  *      - none
00068  * return:
00069  *      - string containing html code for the
00070  *        form
00071  *
00072  */ 
00073 function FormPeriode($p_cn,$l_default=0,$p_type=OPEN,$p_suff="")
00074 {
00075   switch ($p_type) {
00076   case CLOSED:
00077     $sql_closed="p_closed=true and p_central = false ";
00078     break;
00079   case OPEN:
00080     $sql_closed="p_closed=false";
00081     break;
00082   case NOTCENTRALIZED:
00083     $sql_closed="p_closed=true and p_central = false ";
00084     break;
00085   default:
00086     error("invalide p_type in 'preference.php'#__LINE__");
00087   }
00088   $sql="select p_id,to_char(p_start,'DD.MM.YYYY') as p_start_string,
00089                     to_char(p_end,'DD.MM.YYYY') as p_end_string 
00090         from parm_periode where 
00091          $sql_closed 
00092           order by p_start";
00093           
00094   $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,$sql);
00095   $Max=pg_NumRows($Res);
00096   if ( $Max == 0 ) return null;
00097   $ret='<SELECT NAME="periode'.$p_suff.'">';
00098   for ( $i = 0; $i < $Max;$i++) {
00099     $l_line=pg_fetch_array($Res,$i);
00100     if ( $l_default == $l_line['p_id'] )
00101       $sel="SELECTED";
00102     else
00103       $sel="";
00104 
00105     $ret.=sprintf('<OPTION VALUE="%s" %s>%s - %s',$l_line['p_id']
00106                   ,$sel
00107                   ,$l_line['p_start_string']
00108                   ,$l_line['p_end_string']);
00109 
00110   }
00111   $ret.="</SELECT>";
00112   return $ret;
00113 }
00114 /* function GetPeriode
00115  * Purpose :Give the start & end date of a periode
00116  * 
00117  * parm : 
00118  *      - connection
00119  *      - p_periode
00120  * gen :
00121  *      - none
00122  * return:
00123  *      - array containing the start date & the end date
00124  *
00125  */ 
00126 function GetPeriode($p_cn,$p_periode) 
00127 {
00128  $sql="select to_char(p_start,'DD.MM.YYYY') as p_start,
00129               to_char(p_end,'DD.MM.YYYY')   as p_end
00130        from parm_periode
00131          where p_id=".$p_periode;
00132  $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,$sql);
00133  if ( pg_NumRows($Res) == 0) return null;
00134  return pg_fetch_array($Res,0);
00135 
00136 }
00137 /* function  PeriodeClosed($p_cn,$p_periode) 
00138  * Purpose :
00139  * 
00140  * parm : 
00141  *      - 
00142  * gen :
00143  *      -
00144  * return:
00145  *      - true if closed
00146  *
00147  */ 
00148 function PeriodeClosed($p_cn,$p_periode) 
00149 {
00150  $sql="select p_closed
00151        from parm_periode
00152          where p_id=".$p_periode;
00153  $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,$sql);
00154  if ( pg_NumRows($Res) == 0) return null;
00155  $l_line=pg_fetch_array($Res,0);
00156  return $l_line['p_closed'];
00157 
00158 }
00159 /* function GetExercice
00160  * Purpose :
00161  * 
00162  * parm : 
00163  *      - $p_cn connection
00164  *      - $p_periode periode
00165  * gen :
00166  *      -
00167  * return:
00168  *      - Exercice of the periode
00169  *
00170  */ 
00171 function GetExercice($p_cn,$p_periode)
00172 {
00173   $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,"select p_exercice from parm_periode".
00174                " where p_id=$p_periode");
00175   if ( pg_NumRows($Res) == 0 ) return "";
00176   $line=pg_fetch_array($Res,0);
00177   return $line['p_exercice'];
00178 }
00179 /* function ShowDevise
00180  * Purpose :
00181  * 
00182  * parm : 
00183  *      - 
00184  * gen :
00185  *      -
00186  * return:
00187  *      -
00188  *
00189  */ 
00190 function ShowDevise($p_cn)
00191 {
00192  echo "<h2 class=\"info\"> Devises </H2>";
00193   echo '<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER">';
00194   echo "<TR>";
00195   echo '<TH> CODE </TH>';
00196   echo '<TH> Valeur <BR>(par rapport à l\'euro) </TH>';
00197   echo "</TR>";
00198 
00199   $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,"select pm_id,pm_code,pm_rate  from parm_money order by pm_code");
00200   $Max=pg_NumRows($Res);
00201   
00202   for ($i=0;$i<$Max;$i++) {
00203     $l_line=pg_fetch_array($Res,$i);
00204     echo '<TR>'; 
00205     echo '<TD>'.$l_line['pm_code'].'</TD>';
00206     $l_rate=sprintf("% 10.6f",$l_line['pm_rate']);
00207     echo '<TD ALIGN="RIGHT">'.$l_rate.'</TD>';
00208     echo "<TD class=\"mtitle\"> <A class=\"mtitle\" HREF=\"dossier_prefs.php?p_mid=$l_line[pm_id]&p_action=change&p_code=$l_line[pm_code]&p_rate=$l_line[pm_rate]\">Change</A></TD>";
00209     echo "<TD class=\"mtitle\"> <A class=\"mtitle\" HREF=\"dossier_prefs.php?p_mid=$l_line[pm_id]&p_action=delete&p_code=$l_line[pm_code]\">Efface</A></TD>";
00210     echo '</TR>';
00211     
00212   }
00213   echo '<TR> <FORM ACTION="dossier_prefs.php" METHOD="POST">';
00214 echo '<TD> <INPUT TYPE="text" NAME="p_devise"></TD>';
00215  echo '<TD> <INPUT TYPE="text" NAME="p_rate"></TD>';
00216  echo '<TD> <INPUT TYPE="SUBMIT" NAME="action" Value="Ajout"</TD>';
00217  echo '</FORM></TR>';
00218  echo '</TABLE>';
00219 }
00220 /* function ShowPeriode
00221  * Purpose :
00222  * 
00223  * parm : 
00224  *      - 
00225  * gen :
00226  *      -
00227  * return:
00228  *      -
00229  *
00230  */ 
00231 function ShowPeriode($p_cn)
00232 {
00233   //  echo "<h2 class=\"info\"> Période </H2>";
00234   $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,"select p_id,to_char(p_start,'DD.MM.YYYY') as date_start,to_char(p_end,'DD.MM.YYYY') as date_end,p_central,p_closed,p_exercice
00235   from parm_periode order by p_start");
00236   $Max=pg_NumRows($Res);
00237   echo '<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER">';
00238   echo "</TR>";
00239   echo '<TH> Date début </TH>';
00240   echo '<TH> Date fin </TH>';
00241   echo '<TH> Exercice </TH>';
00242   echo "</TR>";
00243   
00244   for ($i=0;$i<$Max;$i++) {
00245     $l_line=pg_fetch_array($Res,$i);
00246     echo '<TR>'; 
00247     echo '<TD ALIGN="CENTER"> '.$l_line['date_start'].'</TD>';
00248     echo '<TD  ALIGN="CENTER"> '.$l_line['date_end'].'</TD>';
00249     echo '<TD  ALIGN="CENTER"> '.$l_line['p_exercice'].'</TD>';
00250     echo_debug('preference.php',__LINE__," closed : $l_line[p_closed]");
00251     if ( $l_line['p_closed'] == 't' )     { 
00252       $closed=($l_line['p_central']=='t')?'<TD>Centralisée</TD>':'<TD>Fermée</TD>';
00253       $change='<TD></TD>';
00254       $remove='<TD></TD>';
00255     } else {
00256       $closed='<TD class="mtitle">'; 
00257       $closed.='<A class="mtitle" HREF="user_advanced.php?p_action=periode&action=closed&p_per='.$l_line['p_id'].'"> Cloturer</A>';
00258     $change='<TD class="mtitle">';
00259     $change.='<A class="mtitle" HREF="user_advanced.php?p_action=periode&action=change_per&p_per='.
00260       $l_line['p_id']."&p_date_start=".$l_line['date_start'].
00261       "&p_date_end=".$l_line['date_end']."&p_exercice=".
00262       $l_line['p_exercice']."\"> Changer</A>";
00263     $remove='<TD class="mtitle">';
00264     $remove.='<A class="mtitle" HREF="user_advanced.php?p_action=periode&action=delete_per&p_per='.
00265       $l_line['p_id']."\"> Efface</A>";
00266 
00267     }
00268     echo "$closed";
00269     echo $change;
00270 
00271     echo $remove;
00272 
00273     echo '</TR>';
00274     
00275   }
00276   echo '<TR> <FORM ACTION="user_advanced.php?p_action=periode" METHOD="POST">';
00277   echo '<TD> <INPUT TYPE="text" NAME="p_date_start" SIZE="10"></TD>';
00278   echo '<TD> <INPUT TYPE="text" NAME="p_date_end" SIZE="10"></TD>';
00279   echo '<TD> <INPUT TYPE="text" NAME="p_exercice" SIZE="10"></TD>';
00280   echo '<TD> <INPUT TYPE="SUBMIT" NAME="add_per" Value="Ajout"</TD>';
00281   echo '<TD></TD>';
00282   echo '<TD></TD>';
00283   echo '</FORM></TR>';
00284 
00285   echo '</TABLE>';
00286 }
